original_title: Saga do Lenhador Assassino (I, II e III)
overview: Inspired by "slasher films", these shorts stand out exactly for the creativity of Ruben Ferreira, creating an antagonist who uses his axe as a deadly weapon, while everything and everyone finds it very difficult to rid themselves of this once for all.
title: Saga do Lenhador Assassino (I, II e III)
